title: HYPER/ECHO
creator_credit: Andrew Gleeson, Cecile Richard and Firepit Collective
brief_description: HYPER/ECHO points to our relationship with technology and the digital world, how brittle and ephemeral – often by design – its infrastructure really is, and to the fundamental human desire to preserve and pass down knowledge, even when buildings crumble down, languages wane, and hyperlinks break.
creator_credit_for_label: Andrew Gleeson, Cecile Richard and Firepit Collective
